shortdesc.ph: Sets the local voice reverberation option, including the virtual stereo.

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated as of v2.4.0. We recommend using [2/2] to start an audio call test.

section.p: This method sets the local voice reverberation for users in a `COMMUNICATION` channel or hosts in a `LIVE_BROADCASTING` channel. After successfully calling this method, all users in the channel can hear the voice with reverberation.

ul.li: When using the enumeration value prefixed with AUDIO_REVERB_FX, please make sure to set the profile parameter to (4) or (5) before calling this method, otherwise the method setting is invalid.
To achieve better audio effect quality, Agora recommends calling and setting the profile parameter to (4) or (5) before setting this enumerator.
This method works best with the human voice, and Agora does not recommend using it for audio containing music and a human voice.
Do not use this method with , because the method called later overrides the one called earlier. For detailed considerations, see the advanced guide Voice Changer and Reverberation.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

pd.p: The local voice changer option. The default value is , which means the original voice. For details, see .
To implement better voice effects, Agora recommends enumerations with AUDIO_REVERB_FX as the prefix.
